name: Kitchen Clicker
description:
Welcome to Kitchen Clicker, where you have your own little kitchen and try to gain money and experience while cooking and selling your meals.

How to play:

Buy ingredients and drag them to your cookware. Once they're all done you can sell them. Gain experience to unlock more recipes.

Important: The game is still in development. There will be more to unlock soon (i.e. cooks and waiters who will automate your kitchen)

The game was made during 1-Bit Clicker Jam in April 2017.
